title: Testing streaming quality. Will be playing Hearthstone as League does not like XSplit.
body:
Im mainly testing Video/Audio quality.
Messing around with R.N.G hunter in ranked there.

(Not face hunter, mid range and so on)
The deck is filled with nothing but R.N.G cards, except for 1 card.
Basically im having fun playing a stupid deck, which seems to work to some extent.

EDIT: someones raging at me XD

EDIT: I should not be winning games with this god damn shitty deck.
